# Prism Repository Structure

**Version**: 1.0.0  
**Based on**: [OpenAI Codex](https://github.com/openai/codex)

## Structure

```
prism/
├── packages/          # TypeScript packages (Turborepo)
├── mcp-servers/       # MCP server implementations
├── kernel-extensions/ # AI-native OS extensions
├── extensions/        # IDE extensions & visualizations
├── apps/              # Applications
└── docs/              # Documentation
```

See [ARCHITECTURE.md](../ARCHITECTURE.md) for details.
